jobInfo.postDescription:
Job Title: Junior UPS Testing and After-sales Engineer

We are seeking a highly motivated and skilled Electrical Power Equipment Debugging and After-sales Engineer to join our team. In this role, you will primarily be responsible for the testing and after-sales work of UPS, chargers, and other related power supply equipment. Additionally, you will be expected to assist in CAD drawing and document preparation.
Responsibilities:
- Testing and after-sales work of UPS, chargers, and other related power equipment
- Assist in CAD drawing and document preparation
- Provide technical support to customers
- Perform on-site commissioning and maintenance work
- Work with cross-functional teams to resolve technical issues
Requirements:
- Bachelor's degree or above in Electrical Engineering or related field
- Fresh graduates are welcome to apply
- Basic knowledge of electrical power electronics
- Strong hands-on skills and ability to learn quickly
- Good command of English language with a willingness to improve. CET-6 or equivalent is preferred.
- Willingness to travel frequently
- Work location is in Tongzhou District, Beijing
If you are passionate about electrical power equipment, have strong technical skills, and are interested in joining a dynamic team, we encourage you to apply for this position
jobInfo.address: 北京通州区北宁电力电子(北京)有限公司北京市通州工业开发区广源东街6号
